name: Black Hills Gold
description: From its brown-sugar color to its pear and apple flavors, this drink from Pops for Champagne in Chicago would be a fine choice to serve at an upcoming holiday gathering.
recipeIngredient: 1 ginger tea bag, such as Yogi ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Brew ginger tea according to teabag directions and let cool.
Combine Xante pear liqueur, apple cider, 1/2 ounce ginger tea, and bitters in a cocktail glass or Champagne flute. Stir to mix. Top with cava and garnish with a star anise pod.
